title: Serum
subtitle: Serum Proteomics Analysis
description: Analyze circulating biomarkers and secreted proteins in serum samples. Provide reliable proteomics solutions for disease biomarker discovery, immune response monitoring, and therapeutic efficacy evaluation.

features.title: Biomarker Profiling
features.description: Identify disease-specific biomarkers for cancer, cardiovascular diseases, metabolic disorders, and more. Accurately quantify thousands of serum proteins.

features.title: Immune Protein Analysis
features.description: Comprehensively analyze immune-related proteins including antibodies, cytokines, and complement proteins. Assess inflammatory responses and immune status.

features.title: Large Cohort Studies
features.description: Consistently process hundreds of serum samples with standardized workflows. Scalable solution for epidemiological studies and clinical trials.
